snippet.title: Airship: Kingdoms Adrift - Official Announce Trailer | Publisher Spotlight Showcase 2023 (Freedom Ga
snippet.description: Take a look at Airship: Kingdoms Adrift in this trailer to see features, like world exploration, industrial development, and more from this upcoming game where you are a newly commissioned airship captain, and must forge a mercantile empire across the archipelago, until the great powers of Europa turn their attention toward it. In Airship: Kingdoms Adrift, build up a fleet, chart trade routes, establish industries, and explore the frontier at your airship's helm. Airship: Kingdoms Adrift will be available on PC.
